```{r   }
# Add country column -----------------------------------------------------------
df.germany$country      <- "Germany"
df.spain$country        <- "Spain"
df.italy$country        <- "Italy"
df.netherlands$country  <- "Netherlands"
df.portugal$country     <- "Portugal"
df.france$country       <- "France"
df.england$country      <- "United Kingdom"
df.russia$country       <- "Russia"
df.belgium$country      <- "Belgium"
df.scotland$country     <- "Scotland"

# Creating new data frame containing all data -----------------------------------
df.football <- rbind(df.belgium, df.england)
df.football <- rbind(df.football, df.france)
df.football <- rbind(df.football, df.germany)
df.football <- rbind(df.football, df.italy)
df.football <- rbind(df.football, df.netherlands)
df.football <- rbind(df.football, df.portugal)
df.football <- rbind(df.football, df.russia)
df.football <- rbind(df.football, df.scotland)
df.football <- rbind(df.football, df.spain)

# Rename countries across dataframe --------------------------------------------
df.football[df.football == "Bosnia-Herzegovina"] <- "Bosnia and Herzegovina"
df.football[df.football == "Cote d’Ivoire"] <- "Côte d’Ivoire"
df.football[df.football == "England"] <- "United Kingdom"
df.football[df.football == "Hongkong"] <- "Hong Kong"
df.football[df.football == "Korea, North"] <- "North Korea"
df.football[df.football == "Korea, South"] <- "South Korea"
df.football[df.football == "Neukaledonien"] <- "New Caledonia"
df.football[df.football == "North Macedonia"] <- "Macedonia [FYROM]"
df.football[df.football == "Northern Ireland"] <- "United Kingdom"
df.football[df.football == "Scotland"] <- "United Kingdom"
df.football[df.football == "St. Kitts & Nevis"] <- "Saint Kitts and Nevis"
df.football[df.football == "The Gambia"] <- "Gambia"
df.football[df.football == "Wales"] <- "United Kingdom"

# Load country data set --------------------------------------------------------
df.countries <- read.csv("world_country_and_usa_states_latitude_and_longitude_values.csv")
df.countries <- subset(df.countries, select = c(country, latitude, longitude))

df.football <- left_join(df.football, df.countries, 
              by = join_by(country == country))
df.football <- df.football %>% rename(country_lat = latitude, country_lon = longitude)

df.football <- left_join(df.football, df.countries, 
              by = join_by(dealing_country == country))
df.football <- df.football %>% rename(dealing_country_lat = latitude, dealing_country_lon = longitude)

# Drop unimportant columns -----------------------------------------------------
df.football <- subset(df.football, select = -c(short_pos, is_loan, loan_status))
col.order <- c("season", "window", "country", "country_lat", "country_lon", "league", "club", "movement", 
               "dealing_club", "dealing_country", "dealing_country_lat", "dealing_country_lon",  "name", "age", "nationality", 
               "position", "market_value", "fee")
df.football <- df.football[, col.order]

# Drop unimportant rows --------------------------------------------------------
df.football <- df.football[!(df.football$dealing_country == ""), ]
df.football <- df.football[!(is.na(df.football$dealing_country)), ]
df.football <- df.football[!(df.football$dealing_club == ""), ]
df.football <- df.football[!(is.na(df.football$dealing_club)), ]
df.football <- df.football[!(df.football$dealing_club == "Ban" | 
                               df.football$dealing_club == "Career break" | 
                               df.football$dealing_club == "Own Youth" |
                               df.football$dealing_club == "Retired" |
                               df.football$dealing_club == "Unknown" |
                               df.football$dealing_club == "Without Club"),]

# Save df.football -------------------------------------------------------------
save(df.football, file = "football-transfers.RData")
write.csv(df.football, "C:/Users/flori/Desktop/Business Analytics/S2/T1/Network Analytics/02 Group Project/football-transfers.csv", row.names=FALSE)

# Load previously saved df.football --------------------------------------------
load("football-transfers.RData")
```
